sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) Immediately after an opponent moves to engage the character, the character may spend one Destiny Point to disengage from that opponent as an out-of-turn incidental.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Preemptive avoidance</name> <number>TAL0001104</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-22 04:31:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a529ec38db624c542901de90cf9619ad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-22 04:31:31</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
